title: Collect and Clean Data from our Google+ Online Community Posts
snippet:
Hello!

I am looking for someone is can help our company go through our online community posts/comments and add them to an excel spreadsheet. We are moving to a new online community platform and want to bring context to the new space. You'll be moving data from two Google+ Communities to an Excel CSV file.

I'm looking for someone who can make sense out of large amounts of data, identify the highest value posts/comments (I'll provide guidance about what to look for), and add them into a clean, bring CSV for our tech team to use for migration of the information. 

Anticipated workload: 8-10 hours
